_sText:
This map is a rework of bhop_pain! I have completed this version segmented in Momentum Mod multiple times. Please test it on CS:S and let me know if it can't be completed for any particular reason in the game. Otherwise this map is very hard and very un-fun.

No checkpoints.

Maybe 2 - 3 mins long.

Somewhere between tier 7 and tier 9. I don't think anybody can do a full run, but segmented and TAS are very possible.

edit: Map has now been beaten by player Triedsame! GG
